title: Love in the Fast Lane
description: For as long as she could remember, Alison's life had revolved around her boyfriend, Marty. She had even shared his interest in car racing - until he was killed in a tragic accident. She didn't think she would ever get over him. Then she met Billy Kendall. Maybe he'd be able to open her heart to love again.Instead Billy becomes a painful reminder of the past when Alison discovers his enthusiasm for motocross. She can't ask Billy to stop racing, but she can't live with a heart full of fear, either. Is she doomed once again to lose the boy she loves?
author: Rosemary Vernon
